name: search_internet_google
description: Search the internet using Google via web scraping (free, but may be rate limited). This tool only performs searches and returns URLs/snippets - requires fetch_webpage tool to view actual webpage content.

metadata.use_case: Search Google for potentially better results than DuckDuckGo. Returns URLs and snippets only - use fetch_webpage tool to read actual page content.
metadata.note: This tool only searches and returns URLs. Enable fetch_webpage tool to read actual webpage content.
metadata.warning: May be rate limited by Google - use sparingly
